headline: Samsung Electronics Deepens AI Memory And Security Push With New Partnerships
summary: Samsung Electronics (KOSE:A005930) has started mass production and commercial shipments of its HBM4 memory for AI and datacenter customers. The company is joining Applied Materials' planned US$5b EPIC Center in Silicon Valley to work on next generation semiconductor process R&D and commercialization. Samsung has agreed a partnership with Getmobil in Turkey to support the refurbished electronics market. The company is collaborating with SEMIFIVE on fully homomorphic encryption accelerators...
